text: بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَٱلزُّبُرِۗ وَأَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلذِّكۡرَ لِتُبَيِّنَ لِلنَّاسِ مَا نُزِّلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

translation.en: [We sent them] with clear proofs and written ordinances. And We revealed to you the message that you may make clear to the people what was sent down to them and that they might give thought
translation.id: (mereka Kami utus) dengan membawa keterangan-keterangan (mukjizat) dan kitab-kitab. Dan Kami turunkan Aż-Żikr (Alquran) kepadamu, agar engkau menerangkan kepada manusia apa yang telah diturunkan kepada mereka455) dan agar mereka memikirkan
